queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-ui}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-apim3-ui}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-api}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-apim3-api}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-portal}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-apim3-portal}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-gateway}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-apim3-gateway}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

queries.query_name: Volume Mount With OS Directory Write Permissions
queries.description: Containers can mount sensitive folders from the hosts, giving them potentially dangerous access to critical host configurations and binaries.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-ui}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-apim3-ui}}.volumeMounts.name={{config}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-portal}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-apim3-portal}}.volumeMounts.name={{config}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-api}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-apim3-api}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-api}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-apim3-api}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-portal}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-apim3-portal}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-portal}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-apim3-portal}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-ui}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-apim3-ui}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-ui}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-apim3-ui}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-gateway}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-apim3-gateway}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-gateway}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-apim3-gateway}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

queries.description: Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-portal}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-apim3-portal}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-api}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-apim3-api}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-ui}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-apim3-ui}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-gateway}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-apim3-gateway}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined

queries.query_name: RBAC Roles with Read Secrets Permissions
queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with get/watch/list RBAC permissions on Kubernetes secrets are dangerous and should be avoided. In case of compromise, attackers could abuse these roles to access sensitive data, such as passwords, tokens and keys

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-role}}.rules[0] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-role}}.rules[0] is granted read access (verbs: get, list, watch) to Secrets objects

queries.description: Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-ui}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-apim3-ui}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-gateway}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-apim3-gateway}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined

metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-portal}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-apim3-portal}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined

metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-portal}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-ui}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false

files.expected_value: The metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-role}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["get", "list", "watch"]]

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-portal}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{release-name-apim3-portal}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-portal}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{release-name-apim3-portal}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-gateway}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{release-name-apim3-gateway}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-ui}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{release-name-apim3-ui}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-ui}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{release-name-apim3-ui}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-api}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{release-name-apim3-api}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-api}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{release-name-apim3-api}}

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-apim3-gateway}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated
